item.title: Bows & Flowers. Illustrating Sewing Plans
item.description: While my dress form is still drying, I had some time to illustrate my sewing plans. Prologue A magical commercial or Iâ€™d better say, a short-film by Gucci inspired me to draw a couple of illustrations. That film tells a story about a man & two girls, who spend their time in mystic & foggy Venice. The city is empty, everything is blurred & tainted with gold & foggy grey colours.
